plot: A drama about the 2008 financial crisis. A financial manager visits a dominatrix who is worried about her financial securities. Together they come up with a solution far more obscene than their deviant play.
title: The Seduction of Mr. P
plot_es: A drama about the 2008 financial crisis. A financial manager visits a dominatrix who is worried about her financial securities. Together they come up with a solution far more obscene than their deviant play.

produce.name: USC School of Cinema and Television
